title: We searched for the best pizza in Naples — here's who came out on top
text:
Insider travelled to Naples to find the city’s best pizza.

We visited four pizzerias, Gino e Toto Sorbillo, Starita, Pizzaria La Notizia, and Antica Pizzeria Da Michele.

We rated pizzas on flavour, the combination of the toppings, and chewiness of the dough.

Visit Insider’s homepage for more stories.

INSIDER producers Harry Kersh and Claudia Romeo travelled to Naples to find the best pizza in the city.

The restaurants they visited have received several accolades, with one being very popular on Instagram, another shooting to fame after being featured in a big-name Hollywood movie, and one which had served pizza to Pope John Paul II.

Watch the video to find out which one came out on top.
